about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello! I'm Ibtissame Jabir, a third-year AI student. I seek freelance opportunities in content writing, virtual assistance, data entry, and transcription. With my passion for AI and skills in communication and organization, I aim to deliver high-quality work.
about.bio: My name is Ibtissame Jabir, an enthusiastic AI student and freelancer. I have experience in algorithm development, data analysis, and providing professional services in writing and organization. I aim to combine my technical and creative skills to create value in projects.

projectsList.title: Survey on AI-Driven Law Enforcement: NGI System
projectsList.description: A survey exploring the role of AI and biometric technologies in modern law enforcement, focusing on the FBI's Next Generation Identification (NGI) system. It provides a comprehensive overview of NGI methods like fingerprint, facial, iris, and tattoo recognition, enhanced by AI technologies such as machine learning, big data analytics, and cloud computing.

projectsList.title: Intrusion Detection Using Semi-Supervised Learning
projectsList.description: A research project on intrusion detection using semi-supervised learning, evaluated on three benchmark datasets. Achieved high accuracy, demonstrating model robustness and effectiveness in identifying security threats.

projectsList.title: Emotion Recognition System
projectsList.description: Developed an emotion recognition system using deep learning as my first project in the field. Gained hands-on experience in algorithms, dataset analysis, and model evaluation.
